keyword: how many calories in fried chicken
title: How Many Calories in Fried Chicken?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in fried chicken per 100g, including protein, fat, carbs, and nutrition breakdowns with tweaks for healthier options.
h1: How Many Calories in Fried Chicken?
assumptions: Breaded, deep-fried chicken pieces with skin; averaged across cuts like breast and thigh; no additional sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, breading type, frying oil, brand, and portion size. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: Fried chicken has about 239 kcal per 100g, mainly from fat and breading.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Air-fried instead of deep-fried (less oil absorbed)

faqs.q: How many calories in fried chicken per 100g?
faqs.a: Approximately 239 kcal per 100g of breaded, deep-fried chicken.

faqs.q: Is fried chicken high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 15g total fat per 100g, mostly from frying oil and skin.

faqs.q: How much protein in fried chicken?
faqs.a: Around 14g protein per 100g, providing a decent source despite the breading.

faqs.q: Does baking fried chicken reduce calories?
faqs.a: Yes, baked versions can cut calories by 50-100 per 100g compared to deep-fried.

faqs.q: What affects calories in fried chicken most?
faqs.a: Frying method, breading amount, skin inclusion, and portion size impact calories significantly.
